section_1.title: Emerging Venture Capital Fellows
section_1.subtitle: The community for future Venture Capital leaders in Latin America üöÄ
section_1.text: In venture capital, talent isn't enough. You need access to industry leaders, strategic connections, and the knowledge that opens doors to leadership positions. That's why we created Emerging Venture Capital Fellows (EVCF): an exclusive community designed to accelerate your career within the ecosystem.

button.text: I want to be a fellow

option.text: ‚úì Real Networking: Build meaningful relationships with fellows and industry leaders.
‚úì In-depth content: Participate in discussions on essential industry topics, from the Partner journey to liquidity scenarios.
‚úì Access to big names: Interact closely with Managing Partners of the most relevant funds in Brazil and around the world.
‚úì Exclusive quarterly agenda: In-person and online events that combine learning, inspiration, and strategic connections.
